ch.linetic.analysis.analyzers

Class OrientationAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.linetic.analysis.Analyzer
      • ch.linetic.analysis.analyzers.OrientationAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnalyzerInterface

    public final class OrientationAnalyzer
extends Analyzer
    Analyze the orientation of the body 0% means that the person is facing the kinect 100 means that the person is oriented 90 degrees on the right or on the left
    Author:
    ketsio

      • doTrigger

        public boolean doTrigger(float finalValue)
        Description copied from interface: AnalyzerInterface
        Check if we can trigger the result to all the clients connected given the result between RANGE_MIN and RANGE_MAX
        Parameters:
        finalValue - the final result of the analyzer
        Returns:
        true if we should trigger, false otherwise
